name: Stranded on Cow island
description:
I made this in the coding language scratch, it is still in development so expect bugs, Version is 0.0.0.1, I plan to add more features such as;

.temperature

.hunger

.food

.more crafting options

THIS IS A GAME DEMO, Do not expect perfection, there is a good chance it wont be worth the donation, but it still helps the game get updated.
